description: This Java class, `LegacyApsAckedCommandEvent`, is part of a mock Zigbee core event system. It extends `ClusterCommandEvent` and is responsible for sending command events and waiting for APS acknowledgment responses containing a command ID. The class manages a static map of sequence numbers to wait helpers, provides methods to handle received acknowledgments, and encapsulates waiting logic for command responses.
